mapper.select: select a.*,c.member_name,b.goods_name,c.total_point-c.req_point-c.use_point as available_point from nordic.point_goods_req a inner join nordic.point_goods b on a.goods_no = b.goods_no inner join nordic.member c on a.member_code = c.member_code where confirm_yn = 'N' order by a.create_date desc
select * from point_goods_req order by create_date desc

select a.*,c.member_name,b.goods_name from nordic.point_goods_req a inner join nordic.point_goods b on a.goods_no = b.goods_no inner join nordic.member c on a.member_code = c.member_code where confirm_yn = 'Y' order by a.update_date desc

select a.*,c.member_name,b.goods_name from nordic.point_goods_req a inner join nordic.point_goods b on a.goods_no = b.goods_no inner join nordic.member c on a.member_code = c.member_code where confirm_yn = 'Y' and refuse_yn ='N' order by a.update_date desc

select a.*,c.member_name,b.goods_name from nordic.point_goods_req a inner join nordic.point_goods b on a.goods_no = b.goods_no inner join nordic.member c on a.member_code = c.member_code where confirm_yn = 'Y' and refuse_yn ='Y' order by a.update_date desc
